Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/14/1967 to a 2-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
Injured on 5/16/1967 with a Torn Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1971...
Injured on 8/13/1976 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 9/5/1977...
Injured on 8/17/1979 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1982 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/12/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,001 per year...
